pr_title: Rely on the computeIfAbsent logic to prevent duplicated compilation of scripts

timeline.bodyText: The call to checkCompilationLimit() is no longer locked on the ScriptCache, we'll have to make this call safe.
timeline.author: stu-elastic

replies.bodyText: Yeah noticed that too that's why I added commit b55e8e3
replies.author: mjmbischoff

timeline.message: Instead of serializing compilation using a plain lock / mutex combined with a double check, rely on the computeIfAbsent logic to prevent duplicated compilation of scripts.

timeline.author: stu-elastic

replies.bodyText: Yeah I went for the smallest delta, this looks cleaner.
replies.author: mjmbischoff
